entry.def: A hankering for something is a desire or longing for it.

example.ex: From time to time we all get a hankering for something a little different...
example.tran: 我们每个人偶尔都会渴望有点变化。

example.ex: Have you always had a hankering to be an actress?
example.tran: 你是否一直渴望成为一名演员？

means.word_mean: 1. a yearning for something or to do something

auth_sentence.content: Humans cannot have a society where the majority of the men are hankering to kill each other.
auth_sentence.res_content: Humans cannot have a society where the majority of the men are hankering to kill each other.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Humans cannot have a society where the majority of the men are hankering to kill each other.

auth_sentence.content: If I had a hankering for an imposing SUV, I would probably start shopping for a used Chevy Suburban.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: If I had a hankering for an imposing SUV, I would probably start shopping for a used Chevy Suburban.

auth_sentence.content: But if you have a hankering for authentic Belgian fries, there's only one place to go.
